name: Plant Science: Research & Technology
content: Global Episteme takes pleasure to organize conference on "Plant Science: Research & Technology" to be held at Barcelona, Spain during July 06-07 2020\. The conference holds the theme: Plant Research in a Changing Environment. It provides a platform to bring together biologists, plant researchers, agriculturists, academicians, biotechnologists, etc.,. This is one kind of scientific platform with explicit keynote lectures, plenary sessions, Poster competition, Young Researchersâ€™ Forum (YRF), Workshops, Symposiums and Exhibitions from elite researchers, distinguished scientists and business delegates.
